bibl.title: Papyrus Magdalen Greek 17 (Gregory-Aland P64). A Reappraisal.
bibl.note: P. Oxford Magdalen College Inv. Gr. 17 (ex 18) (= van Haelst 336 (2)). - Non vidimus. Cf. Internationale Zeitschriftenschau für Bibelwissenschaft 41 (1994-1995) No. 50a.
